name: grammar-selector
description: Select the grammar to use for the current editor with `ctrl-shift-L`.

showOnRightSideOfStatusBar.description: Show the active pane item's langauge on the right side of Atom's status bar, instead of the left.

showAll.description: Some grammars only exist to be embedded inside others, such as regular expressions. Enable this option to show these grammars in the selection menu.
